snippet: Leaders in Athens fail to come to a final agreement over a stringent austerity package. Now Europe, after days of insisting that a deal must be done - and now - must decide whether to keep the pressure on, or acquiesce once more.
abstract: Leaders in Athens fail to come to a final agreement over a stringent austerity package. Now Europe, after days of insisting that a deal must be done - and now - must decide whether to keep the pressure on, or acquiesce once more.
lead_paragraph: LONDON - The essence of successful brinkmanship is to not fall over the brink.

headline.main: Is Greece Pushing Its Luck — Or Proving You Can't Bluff a Bluffer?
